document.bingtitle: Why does a visa take so long to process? - Yahoo! UK & Ireland Answers
document.webtitle: Why does a visa take so long to process? - Yahoo! UKIreland Answers
document.description: ... they stamp and issue/deny the visa (nowhere near 5 ... can't see how it's not sitting in someone's in-tray ... You have no conception of the number involved
